subject: Vam set
description_text:
Hello!

I have a question about the vam set of 3
Whats in the box? I need to buy the plus x pedal control box, or the pro x ultra pedal control box to use?
I have a t300 rs gt edition wheel, and i need a littlebit more feeling from the pedals.
Witch is a better option for the future? 

Thank you for your answear.
Have a nice day

Best regards
Bence Tibor Strazsa

conversations.body_text: Hi Bence. strazsa,    All you need is an additional Plus X pedal control box.

You have any information about any working cupon code for this set? My wife are not satiesfied about the price, and if you have any working cupon i really appreciate that!
I tried the mpowr5 but it didnt work :(

Have a nice day!

Best regards
Bence Tibor Strazsa



> 2025. dec. 15. dátummal, 10:17 időpontban support@simsonn.com írta:
> 
> ﻿
> Hi Bence. strazsa,
> 
> All you need is an additional Plus X pedal control box.
> 
> 
>
Hi Bence. strazsa,    This price does not meet the criteria for our discount module. We apologize for the inconvenience.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor
